Method Detail

getMatchId

int getMatchId()
Get the match identifier. This is a unique ID representing one match to the gamehub.

Returns:
match id

getPortNumber

int getPortNumber()
Get the port number which game clients should connect to the game server through. The PlayfuelGameServer should never use any other ports than the one assigned through this method.

Returns:
port number

getLobbyName

java.lang.String getLobbyName()
Gets the name of the lobby that started this match.

Returns:
the lobby name

getValueOfGlobalSetting

java.lang.Object getValueOfGlobalSetting(java.lang.String identifier)
                                         throws Playfuel.InvalidSettingException
Gets a value of a global setting. These settings are fetched from the playfuel.mf and are set by the owner of the lobby.

Parameters:
identifier - for the option in the manifest.
Returns:
value of setting as Object, should be safe to type cast to the intended type.
Throws:
Playfuel.InvalidSettingException - if no setting with that identifier exists.

getValueOfSlotSetting

java.lang.Object getValueOfSlotSetting(int slotid,
                                       java.lang.String identifier)
                                       throws Playfuel.InvalidSlotException,
                                              Playfuel.InvalidSettingException
Gets a value of a slot-specific setting. These settings are fetched from the playfuel.mf and are set by each player in the lobby

Parameters:
slotid - which slot
identifier - for the option in the manifest
Returns:
value of setting as Object, should be safe to type cast to the intended type.
Throws:
Playfuel.InvalidSlotException
Playfuel.InvalidSettingException - if no setting with that identifier exists.

getNumberOfSlots

int getNumberOfSlots()
Get how many slots there are in the match.

Returns:
total number of slots

getSlotWithPassword

int getSlotWithPassword(java.lang.String password)
                        throws Playfuel.NoSuchPasswordException
Identifies a slot on password string. The passwords are alphanumeric strings which are generated and sent to each PlayfuelGameClient on launch. Get this value from each client and use this method to decide which client should be assigned to which slot.

Parameters:
password - recieved from game client
Returns:
slotid
Throws:
Playfuel.NoSuchPasswordException

getPasswordMap

@Deprecated
java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getPasswordMap()
Deprecated. If possible, use getSlotWithPassword(String password) instead.

Returns a map of the passwords and slotids.

Returns:
java.util.Map with passwords as keys, and slotid's as values.

getUserNameForSlot

java.lang.String getUserNameForSlot(int slotid)
                                    throws Playfuel.InvalidSlotException
Gets the username for a slot id

Parameters:
slotid - which slot
Returns:
username for that slot
Throws:
Playfuel.InvalidSlotException

getImageForSlot

javax.swing.ImageIcon getImageForSlot(int slotid)
                                      throws Playfuel.InvalidSlotException
Get the user image for a slot id

Parameters:
slotid - which slot
Returns:
user avatar
Throws:
Playfuel.InvalidSlotException

serverIsReady

void serverIsReady()
Call this method when the server is started, and ready to accept connections from game clients.

matchEndedWithResult

void matchEndedWithResult(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> results)
                          throws Playfuel.MalformedResultsException
Call this method when the match is ended. Sends back scores to the master server. The ranking value for each player should be an Integer, where 1 means the player was the winner, and higher values means the player was ranked worse in this match.

Parameters:
results - a map with key slotid and value ranking ranging from 1 to number of players.
Throws:
Playfuel.MalformedResultsException - if not all slots are present.

matchEndedWithoutResults

void matchEndedWithoutResults()
Call this method to end an unranked match without sending scores back to the master server.

matchAborted

void matchAborted()
Call this method if the match was aborted prematurely.
